snippet: A Microsoft-Facebook alliance plans an overhaul of Bing in an effort to loosen Google’s grip on the search engine market.
abstract: Microsoft-Facebook alliance plans an overhaul of Bing in an effort to loosen Google’s grip on the search engine market; changes are designed to improve searches by tapping into the expertise of friends on Facebook and other social networks and provide more personal results; new version of Bing is the largest overhaul since it was introduced three years ago.
lead_paragraph: A Microsoft-Facebook alliance plans an overhaul of Bing in an effort to loosen Google’s grip on the search engine market.

headline.seo: Bing Search Engine Revamped as War Against Google Intensifies
headline.main: A Revamping of Bing in the Battle for Search Engine Supremacy
headline.print_headline: A Revamping of Bing in the Battle for Search Engine Supremacy
